item.title: 奥拉电器公司因供应商会费问题面临两起破产诉讼
item.description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 的一个部门正面临其在印度的两家主要车辆登记服务提供商因未支付欠款而提出的破产申请，这给这家电动汽车制造商增添了越来越多的麻烦。【原文：A unit of Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. is facing insolvency petitions from two of its key vehicle registration service providers in India over unpaid dues, adding to the EV maker’s mounting troubles.】

item.title: 新宇航员抵达国际空间站，滞留的美国宇航员离返回更近了
item.description: 周日清晨，SpaceX 公司的 "龙 "太空舱与国际空间站成功对接，搭载了一名新的宇航员，这将使被困的宇航员布奇-威尔莫尔和苏尼-威廉姆斯最终返回家园。【原文：SpaceX’s Dragon capsule successfully docked with the International Space Station early Sunday morning, carrying a new crew that would allow marooned astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams to finally return home.】

item.title: 中国深圳进一步放宽贷款政策刺激住房销售
item.description: 中国南方城市深圳地方政府周日发表声明称，将进一步放宽住房公积金贷款政策。【原文：China’s local government in the southern city of Shenzhen will further relax policy on housing provident fund loans, according to a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 百度发布人工智能推理模型，挑战 DeepSeek
item.description: 百度公司（Baidu Inc.【原文：Baidu Inc. released a new artificial intelligence model that articulates its reasoning, in an apparent bid to regain momentum against up-and-coming rivals like DeepSeek.】

item.title: 特朗普激怒美国之际，中国股民拥抱 "习特会
item.description: 习近平主席对经济扩张和科技创新的推动，令市场乐观地认为，中国股市将延续今年的上涨势头，并扩大对汹涌而来的美国股市的领先优势。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s push for economic expansion and tech innovation is feeding optimism that Chinese stocks will continue this year’s advance and widen their lead over churning US equities.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易救市行动考验央行官员的神经
item.description: 在未来一周，各国央行可能会对唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策如何影响世界经济进行首次集体评估，从而出现一种焦虑的观望情绪。【原文：An anxious sense of wait-and-see may emerge from central banks in the coming week, in their first collective assessment of how President Donald Trump’s trade policies are impacting the world economy.】

item.title: 五张图表显示信贷自满情绪正在瓦解
item.description: 企业债务的光辉岁月正显示出褪色的迹象，贸易战抑制了对信贷的持续需求。【原文：Corporate debt’s halcyon days are showing signs of fading, with trade wars damping what had been a relentless demand for credit.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与非洲开发银行合作建设 78 亿美元的非洲最大机场
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚航空集团和非洲开发银行将合作建设一个新机场，预计耗资 78 亿美元，将成为非洲最大的机场。【原文：Ethiopian Airlines Group and African Development Bank will partner to build a new airport that’s estimated to cost $7.8 billion and is set to be Africa’s largest.】

item.title: 法新社报道：Telegram 的杜罗夫已暂时离开法国
item.description: 法新社援引未透露身份的消息来源报道称，Telegram 消息应用程序首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）已获准离开法国数周。【原文：Pavel Durov, chief executive officer of the Telegram messaging app, has been allowed to leave France for several weeks, Agence France-Press reported, citing sources who weren’t identified.】

item.title: 美国关税争端助推加拿大顶级交易所交易繁荣
item.description: 北美贸易战的早期炮火为加拿大最大的衍生品交易所运营商带来了福音。【原文：The early salvos in a North American trade war have been a boon to the operator of Canada’s largest derivatives exchange.】

item.title: 英国 PZ Cussons 公司解决尼日利亚贷款问题的计划被否决
item.description: 肥皂制造商 PZ Cussons 的尼日利亚业务股东拒绝了母公司将贷款转换成股票的提议。【原文：Shareholders in the Nigerian business of soap maker PZ Cussons have rejected a proposal by the parent to convert a loan into shares.】

item.title: 华尔街周报公共卫生领域的第二次机会和收费高昂的首席执行官的第二次行动
item.description:
Covid-19发病五年后的生活 以及里德-黑斯廷斯在Netflix之后的生活

Life five years after the onset of Covid-19 and Reed Hastings' life after Netflix

】

item.title: 关税迫在眉睫，华尔街对 S&P 500 利润的看法正在变坏
item.description: 华尔街对美国公司利润引擎的信心正在减弱，严重受挫的美国股市可能面临更多动荡。【原文：Wall Street’s confidence in Corporate America’s profit engine is fraying, threatening more turbulence ahead for a badly bruised US stock market.】

item.title: 贸易差距和支出 "浪费 "如何增强美国实力
item.description: 大约一千年前，在宋朝统治时期，中国的权力内部酝酿着一场重大的不满。【原文：About a millennium ago during the reign of the Song dynasty, there was a major grievance brewing inside China’s halls of power.】

item.title: 中国呼吁开展人工智能技能培训，帮助毕业生找到工作
item.description: 随着世界第二大经济体今年面临创纪录的毕业生人数，中国教育部呼吁全国各大学增设职业课程，并提供人工智能应用培训，以帮助学生找到工作。【原文：China’s education ministry called on universities nationwide to add vocational courses and provide training on artificial intelligence applications to help students find jobs as the world’s second biggest economy confronts a record number of graduates this year.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：关税引发美国通胀担忧
item.description: 美国消费者对美国关税可能对经济和他们的钱袋子造成的影响迅速产生焦虑。【原文：Anxiety is building quickly among US consumers about the likely impact from US tariffs on the economy and their pocketbooks.】

item.title: 据说 Ardian 接近以 10 亿欧元收购可再生能源公司 Akuo
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 Ardian SAS 即将达成一项交易，以约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的价格收购法国可再生能源公司 Akuo Energy SAS。【原文：Buyout firm Ardian SAS is nearing a deal to acquire French renewable firm Akuo Energy SAS for about €1 billion ($1.1 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 尼日尔驱逐中国石油高管，因其未能满足当地含量标准
item.description: 尼日尔军方领导人命令三名中国石油高管离开尼日尔，称他们未能遵守旨在促进使用当地产品和服务的采矿法新规定。【原文：Niger’s military leadership ordered three Chinese oil executives to leave the country, saying they failed to meet a new provision to the mining code aimed at promoting the use of local goods and services.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将取消对沙特阿拉伯移民工人的禁令
item.description: 在海湾国家保证提供更严格的劳动保护后，印度尼西亚将签署一项协议，取消长达十年之久的暂停向沙特阿拉伯派遣公民作为家庭佣工和正规部门雇员的禁令。【原文：Indonesia is set to sign an agreement to lift its decade-long moratorium on sending citizens to Saudi Arabia as domestic workers and formal sector employees, following assurances of stricter labor protections from the Gulf nation.】

item.title: 普京希望向欧洲出售更多俄罗斯天然气。他能做到吗？
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）似乎有信心，如果美国斡旋达成结束乌克兰战争的协议，就可以增加输往欧洲的天然气管道流量—；这也引发了欧洲大陆是否愿意扭转方向、重振这种关系的问题。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin seems confident that pipeline flows of natural gas to Europe could be stepped up if a US-brokered deal to end the war in Ukraine is agreed — raising questions about whether the continent is willing to reverse course and revive that relationship.】

item.title: 对冲基金和私募股权基金高管角逐黎巴嫩货币局局长职位
item.description: 一位私募股权投资专家、一位资深律师和一位对冲基金经理正在角逐黎巴嫩中央银行行长的职位，这是一项关键性的任命，需要通过这项任命来解决陷入困境的银行业及其数十亿美元的赤字问题。【原文：A private-equity specialist along with a senior lawyer and a hedge-fund manager are in the running to become Lebanon’s central-bank governor, a critical appointment needed to fix the troubled banking sector and its multi-billion dollar deficit.】

item.title: 凌晨三点的决战挽救了默茨改变德国游戏规则的计划
item.description: 周五凌晨，德国绿党面临抉择：他们会因为对候任总理弗里德里希-梅尔兹的不满而否决一项改变游戏规则的支出计划，还是支持他们自己几个月来一直要求的激进转变？【原文：In the early hours of Friday, Germany’s Greens were given a choice: Would they veto a game-changing spending plan over grievances with chancellor-in-waiting Friedrich Merz, or back the radical shift they themselves had been demanding for months?】

item.title: 人工智能先驱希望欧洲打造自己更灵活的前进之路
item.description: OpenAI 和 Mistral AI 所采用的机器学习方法对功率要求极高，其基本信念之一是，人工智能模型在提出新见解之前必须审查其整个数据集。【原文：One belief underlying the power-hungry approach to machine learning advanced by OpenAI and Mistral AI is that an artificial intelligence model must review its entire dataset before spitting out new insights.】

item.title: 市场让你致富。现在就保持下去
item.description: 你发财了。现在继续发财吧【原文：You got rich. Now stay rich.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称巴基斯坦审查和新气候贷款取得进展
item.description: 国际货币基金组织驻巴基斯坦代表团团长表示，国际货币基金组织和巴基斯坦政府在发放当前计划下的下一笔 10 亿美元贷款以及同意为气候相关行动提供新贷款方面取得了进展。【原文：The head of the International Monetary Fund’s mission to Pakistan said the lender and the government have made progress toward releasing the next $1 billion tranche under its current program as well as agreeing to a new loan for climate-related action.】

item.title: 韩国和美国高级官员在华盛顿举行贸易谈判
item.description: 韩国和美国高级官员在华盛顿会晤，讨论包括关税措施在内的贸易问题，双方同意继续对话。【原文：Senior South Korean and US officials met in Washington to address trade issues including tariff measures, with both sides agreeing to continue dialogue.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）在受困宇航员返回之前将宇航员送上太空
item.description: 周五，SpaceX 公司向国际空间站发射了一组宇航员，这次备受关注的任务将使被困宇航员布奇-威尔莫尔和苏尼-威廉姆斯最终返回家园。【原文：SpaceX launched a crew to the International Space Station on Friday, a closely watched mission that would allow marooned astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams to finally return home.】

item.title: 穆迪因预算风险下调罗马尼亚信用评级展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调了罗马尼亚的信用评级展望，提高了罗马尼亚被降至垃圾级的风险，因为政治动荡阻碍了罗马尼亚在重新举行总统选举前缩小预算缺口的努力。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lowered Romania’s credit score outlook, raising the risk it could be cut to junk as political turmoil hinders efforts to narrow the budget gap before a presidential election re-run.】

item.title: 穆迪将希腊评级上调至投资级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周五将希腊的评级地位提升至投资级，正式结束了该国自2010年开始的垃圾级评级时代。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lifted Greece’s rating status to investment grade Friday, putting an official end to the country’s junk status era that started back in 2010.】

item.title: 英特尔新任首席执行官获得价值约 6900 万美元的薪酬组合
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.本周被任命为首席执行官的陈立武，如果在未来几年内达到目标，将获得价值约 6900 万美元的报酬。【原文：Incoming Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan, who was named to the position this week, will receive compensation valued at about $69 million if he reaches targets over the coming years.】
